mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_school_info(school_id, education_type, school_name, entrance_date, graduation_date, major, attending_check, transfer_check, gpa, highest_check, double_major, seeker_id) VALUES(USER_SCHOOL_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{educationType}, #{schoolName}, TO_DATE(#{entranceDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{graduationDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{major}, #{attendingCheck}, #{transferCheck}, #{gpa}, #{highestCheck}, #{doubleMajor}, #{seekerId})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_school_info SET education_type = #{educationType}, school_name = #{schoolName}, entrance_date = TO_DATE(#{entranceDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), graduation_date = TO_DATE(#{graduationDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), major = #{major}, attending_check = #{attendingCheck}, transfer_check = #{transferCheck}, gpa = #{gpa}, highest_check = #{highestCheck}, double_major = #{doubleMajor} WHERE school_id = #{schoolId}
mapper.select: SELECT education_type, school_name,TO_CHAR(entrance_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS entrance_date, TO_CHAR(graduation_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS graduation_date, major, attending_check, transfer_check, gpa, highest_check, double_major FROM user_school_info WHERE school_id=#{VALUE}

SELECT education_type, school_name, TO_CHAR(entrance_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS entrance_date, TO_CHAR(graduation_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS graduation_date, major, attending_check, transfer_check, gpa, highest_check, double_major FROM user_school_info WHERE seeker_id = #{seekerId}
